mapper.select: SELECT CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME FROM CATEGORY WHERE USE_YN = 'Y' ORDER BY CATEGORY_NO
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO CATEGORY (CATEGORY_NO, CATEGORY_NAME, CATEGORY_DESC, USE_YN, REG_ID, REG_DATE, MODIFY_ID, MODIFY_DATE) VALUES (#{categoryNo}, #{categoryName}, #{categoryDesc}, #{useYn}, #{regId}, sysdate, #{modifyId}, sysdate)
mapper.update: UPDATE CATEGORY SET CATEGORY_NAME = #{categoryName}, CATEGORY_DESC = #{categoryDesc}, USE_YN =#{useYn}, MODIFY_ID = #{modifyId}, MODIFY_DATE = sysdate WHERE CATEGORY_NO = #{categoryNo}
